text: @realDonaldTrump That's a disgrace, your more worried about some old statue that have been around for ages but your not worried about the coronavirus that IS KILLING PEOPLE DAILY!! YOU NEED YOUR FUCKING STUPID MORONIC HEAD EXAMINED!!!! WHAT A SHAME!!! MAGA, RESIGN!!!!
